nodes.text: Sarrassia was a world in the Sarrassia system, in the Grumani sector. It was a known source of Sarrassian iron.
During the term of Republic Supreme Chancellor Paran Am-Ris, a religious war started on Sarrassia that ravaged the planet for more than two and a half millennia.

During the Republic Dark Age, the war was reported to be ended by the Sith Lord Ayanos Bactra. Bactra succeeded in keeping the Grumani Hierophants in check and barring Spumani Crusaders from pursuing their typically sanguinary quests, although he cared only for the planet's deposits of Sarrassian iron.
